website_summaries.verdict: One of the most recognizable anime characters in a huggable size for an affordable price. A great choice for anime and Pokemon fans.
pros: Popular Pokemon character Pikachu that's loved by fans of the anime series
Eleven-inch size is perfect for youngsters to carry and hold
cons: Rarely, customers received plush dolls that didn't look exactly like the Pikachu toy pictured

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! And flawless! Which was definitely quite a surprise, however a pleasant surprise. I had the initial thought that for $20 I might not be getting the best product I could. But once it arrived I realized quickly, I was wrong. And on too of that, I bought it as a present for my girlfriend and she absolutely adores the little guy! Well made and adorable!,
customer_reviews.author: Jules The Fifth

customer_reviews.title: awesome quality! worth the price :)
customer_reviews.text: amazing! im always skeptical about buying my plushies online because i cannot fully depict what they might look like when they arrive, however this pikachu sits up well, and is very stuffed. very nice fabric and stitching details too! love it!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for a plushy lover
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift for a 7yr old girl and she loved it. But she had one complain, "why are his eyes closed all the time", told her he got sleepy and the way home lol. But she loved it nonetheless since she loves any and all plush toys.
customer_reviews.author: JMB

customer_reviews.title: Was the perfect Pikachu
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, well made and perfect for what it was bought for. We are a Pokemon group and lost a dear member of our group. She was a teacher and loved Pikachu so this was perfect. I can't say how well it will hold up as we put it in her casket with her but I know she would have loved it and wish I had found it before she left us way too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Monique M Adams

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stuffed animal toy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stuffed animal toy. I purchased this for my girlfriend who likes to sleep with a stuffed animal at night and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I got this for a gift for my daughter and ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift for my daughter and she loves it. She didn't really care for the apple, so I simply used a seam ripper and removed the 2 threads holding it in place and you cant even tell it was there.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: it seems good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, my son loves it. The apple became unattached from the hands and I had to sew it back on. This happened less than a week after getting it. Other than that, it seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Win! The best gift as she declared it!
customer_reviews.text: It was $20 dollars and I was at first wondering what can item of this price be.... To my surprise, it was just like the pictures presented by seller. Birthday girl screamed and giggled when she saw it and at the end declared that this present wins birthday gifts! Best money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Tigo

customer_reviews.title: Most beloved toy
customer_reviews.text: My son is OVER THE MOON that he has this Pikachu! Good quality plushy, strong, but soft. Bright colors and cute happy face gives my son a cute happy face!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old. She was overjoyed. She's been carrying it with her everywhere and sleeping with it too.
customer_reviews.author: M. OCallaghan

customer_reviews.title: Toy delivered on the date promised in good condition. I wish the tail wasn't sewn to ...
customer_reviews.text: Toy delivered on the date promised in good condition.I wish the tail wasn't sewn to the back of the Pikachu so it would swing freely, but that's just a nit pick. My child loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M Moore

customer_reviews.title: ... size espically since it shipped quick and its in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Its so cute i thought it'll be bigger but its just to cute to see a problem about the size espically since it shipped quick and its in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: a great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this plush for a Christmas gift and I have to say I had my reserves about it being original, but, when I received it, it had all it's tags and even had a little box. Also, it is very firm yet fluffy. Overall, a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Gonzalez-Torres

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Pikachu
customer_reviews.text: A big hit with the birthday girl. The stitching on the tail was loose but an easy fix. It is a nice size for cuddling.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy good size teddy looks just as shown in picture and my daughter loves it I would buy agen
customer_reviews.author: Ainsley

customer_reviews.title: It is adorable, better than on the picture
customer_reviews.text: It is adorable, better than on the picture. Very nicely put together and the apple makes it even cuter. Wonderful gift

customer_reviews.title: She's happy, which makes me happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter this plush doll and I have zero complaints. She's happy, which makes me happy.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Pikachu Lovers

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star recommendation

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for Pokemon fans.

customer_reviews.title: XD
customer_reviews.text: Pikachu sits on my shelf, and is always so stoked about this apple 10/10

customer_reviews.title: super cute pikachu!
customer_reviews.text: Great Pikachu! The face is so cute with the apple and is a pretty nice height. I would say this seems to be a little skinnier than most Pikachu plushies but it's unnoticable unless you have a lot of Pikachu plushies around.

customer_reviews.title: It got here in time and looked just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Got for my little brothers homecoming proposal to his girlfriend. It got here in time and looked just like the picture. Perfect size as well!

customer_reviews.title: Great Pikachu
customer_reviews.text: No cheap material here. My son carries it everywhere. Absolutely loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable

customer_reviews.title: Is this Pikachu cute?
customer_reviews.text: It sure looks cute. Is it cute? Yes. It's super cute.

customer_reviews.title: The happiest Pikachu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely loved it! Her brother
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11-year old daughter who is a Pokemon fan. She absolutely loved it! Her brother, who is 16, had friends threatening to steal it from her. It was a definitely a hit!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good size for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good and feels soft to the touch. I was debating on ordering this and I am glad I did. The plush is not too pricey either.

customer_reviews.text: Daughter LOVES it, we're unsure what's up with the apple... But she still adores it.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it! I threw it to him from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it! I threw it to him from the float I ride on in a parade here in New Orleans. Since I was allowed to choose what I wanted to be called, he calls me Pikachu, so it was the perfect gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie J. Adams Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly, it looks like it is supposed to look (I wondered if this toy would have Pikachu's signature tail, because I couldn't tell from the photos; and yes it does have the tail!), and it's a great size for the money! This Pikachu is super cute! I'm excited to see my son's excitement when he receives this for his birthday. I definitely recommend purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Davis

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Pikachu
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the cutest Pikachus I've ever seen, my son picked it out and I thought it was kinda strange with the apple but it is ADORABLE!! I cannot believe how fast this shipped to us, it arrived in perfect condition and is a quality stuffed toy. Very happy with his choice :-)
customer_reviews.author: Fussy Boots

customer_reviews.title: Our baby girl kept borrowing her big brothers, so ...
customer_reviews.text: Our baby girl kept borrowing her big brothers, so we thought her other brother should buy her her own.
customer_reviews.author: The Jenkins Clan

customer_reviews.title: ... only gave this one star because I was extremely disappointed when this item arrived
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this one star because I was extremely disappointed when this item arrived. In October I ordered a Large Pikachu plush & it was great. This time however, I also ordered a Large Pikachu plush & got this. At best it's a medium plush, but I don't have any more time to waste by returning it. I won't get a new plush in time for my granddaughter's birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great for any child
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my niece, she knows nothing about pokemon but its now one of her favorite plushies
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

product_meta.title: Pokémon Large Plush, Pikachu
product_meta.description:
Bring home your favorite pokemon home today: it’s Pikachu! 

This Pikachu plush stands at 11 inches tall. He’s great for cuddling, hugging, and hanging out with. His adorable smile is sure to brighten your day. 

Plus, he’s holding a little apple in his hands; that’s pretty cute. But, if Pokemon’s not for you, I’m sure that one of your friends or family would be happy to receive this Pikachu as a gift.
feature_bullets: PLUSH PIKACHU FRIEND - bring home your favorite pokémon today. He's super soft, and made of high quality fabric. Perfect for any child or adult
COMES WITH APPLE - this sweet Pikachu pokemon plush comes holding an apple because every hero needs a snack
ADORABLY ANIMATED - your pokemon figures is making the classic Pikachu laughing face just like the actual character
CUDDLE SIZE - at 11 inches tall, this Pickachu stuffed animal is the perfect size for cuddling and hugging
GREAT PRESENT - even if you're not a pokémon fan, one of your friends or family are sure to love this Pikachu plush

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars233 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
